special_abilities.name: Spellcasting.
descriptions: Thurl is a 5th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). Thurl knows the following sorcerer spells:

descriptions.raw: * Cantrips (at will): friends, gust, light, message, ray of frost
descriptions.hyperlinked: * Cantrips (at will): friends, gust, light, message, ray of frost

descriptions.raw: * 1st level (4 slots): expeditious retreat, feather fall, jump
descriptions.hyperlinked: * 1st level (4 slots): expeditious retreat, feather fall, jump
* 2nd level (3 slots): levitate, misty step

actions.name: Greatsword.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Lance.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d12 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Parry.
descriptions: Thurl adds 2 to his AC against one melee attack that would hit him. To do so, Thurl must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.
